thread.title: $250,000 Hand-Crafted Venetian Mask with Proceeds Benefitting National Breast Cancer Foundation.
thread.title_full: $250,000 Hand-Crafted Venetian Mask with Proceeds Benefitting National Breast Cancer Foundation. - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: $250,000 Hand-Crafted Venetian Mask with Proceeds Benefitting National Breast Cancer Foundation.
text:
The Magnificent Sole Luxe by VIVO Masks is Touted as the Most Expensive Mask in the World.
PALM DESERT, CA (PRWEB) October 13, 2015
In support of Breast Cancer Awareness Month, VIVO Masks, the online masquerade retailer will be donating 100% of net proceeds from the sale of the most expensive mask in the world towards breast cancer research, early detection, and awareness.
The Magnificent Sole Luxe with a hefty price tag of $249,000 is handmade in Italy and designed to support the National Breast Cancer Foundation (NBCF). It boasts a large sunburst headpiece embellished with crystals, beads, and a regal crown.
Additional Features Include:
One of a kind, custom fitted using traditional 16th-century moulding techniques. Hand painted and signed by three world-renowned Venetian artists. 200g 24 carat gold crown. 100g Platinum sun pieces adorned with 250g 18 carat gold finishing. Featuring 5 x 1 carat fair trade conflict-free Canadian diamonds. 2 x 4 carat round cut diamond. Mulberry Silk. Vicuna Wool from the Andes.
“We’re honored to auction off our most prized mask, the Magnificent Sole Luxe in an effort help to support this NBCF in the fight against breast cancer,” says Jackson Cunningham, Co-Founder of VIVO Masks. “This one of a kind piece of art is a perfect parallel for this one of a kind organization that helps so many millions of people affected by this disease.”
The Magnificent Sole Luxe is available for purchase at: http://www.vivomasks.com/products/magnificent-sole-lux . It can be shipped to your door in as fast as two days.
About VIVO Masks:
VIVO Masks is an online storefront that retails and wholesales high-end masquerade masks and fascinators for men and women attending masquerade events like balls, weddings and prom. For more information, please visit http://www.vivomasks.com
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13016268.htm
